tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE intellectual_property_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    filing_date DATE,
    filing_type VARCHAR(50),
    applicant_name VARCHAR(100),
    filing_country VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE intellectual_property_filings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    filing_date DATE,
    filing_type VARCHAR,
    filing_country VARCHAR,
    applicant_name VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE intellectual_property_registrations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    registration_date DATE,
    registration_type VARCHAR,
    registration_country VARCHAR,
    registrant_name VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE intellectual_property_filings (
    filing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    filing_date DATE,
    filing_type VARCHAR(50),
    applicant_name VARCHAR(100),
    filing_country VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE patent_inventions (
    invention_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    filing_id INT,
    invention_title TEXT,
    inventor_name VARCHAR(100),
    invention_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE trademark_registrations (
    registration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    registration_date DATE,
    trademark_name VARCHAR(100),
    registrant_name VARCHAR(100),
    registration_country VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE intellectual_property_filings (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    filing_date DATE,
    filing_type VARCHAR(50),
    applicant_name VARCHAR(100),
    filing_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE patent_registrations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_number VARCHAR(50),
    registration_date DATE,
    patent_title TEXT,
    inventor_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE trademark_registrations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    trademark_number VARCHAR(50),
    registration_date DATE,
    trademark_description TEXT,
    owner_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE copyright_registrations (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    registration_number VARCHAR(50),
    registration_date DATE,
    work_title TEXT,
    author_name VARCHAR(100)
);
